itunes:summary:
TV host and YouTube star Chris Van Vliet talks about being a "professional YouTuber" and living in L.A. -- plus the best celebrities to interview (The Rock, Tom Cruise) and the weirdest (Vin Diesel, who, right after Paul Walker died, sang Wiz Khalifa's "See You Again" before every interview to keep himself emotional)… and you know we had to discuss the “milk crate challenge.”
